Package http.server

Class Response

java.lang.Object
http.server.Response
public class Response
extends java.lang.Object
HTTP response, built from the Header and sent back to the client

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Response​(java.lang.String dir, Header h)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void demoFile​(int code)
    Helper setting the response header to an example status code (only for demonstration purposes)
    void fileNotFound()
    Helper setting the response header to 404 and empty content
    void findDynamicFile()
    From the file, first runs it (currently only Shell scripts work) and return stdout to the socket.
    void findFile()  
    void findStaticFile()
    Finds the file in the system, finds its MIME type and writes it to the payload
    byte[] getPayload()  
    java.lang.String getResponseHeaders()
